course_description: An introduction to Koine Greek as reflected in the New Testament and early emphasis on learning the basic vocabulary, grammar, and syntax required to read the New Testament and to do biblical exegesis.
schedule_location: Th 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_401
